``` {r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
coverStr <- rmarkdown::metadata$'cover-image'

if (!((is.null(coverStr)) || (coverStr == ""))) {
	wd <- getwd()
	setwd("..")
	setwd("..")
	if (file.exists(coverStr)) {
		cat("# Cover {-} \n![](", coverStr, ")")
	}
	setwd(wd)
}
```

cmd0 = "git fetch --all --tags"
cmd = "git tag -l --format='%(taggerdate:short) | %(tag) | %(contents)'"
system(cmd0,intern=FALSE)
updates = system(cmd,intern=TRUE)
if (!((is.null(updates)) || (updates == ""))) {
    cat('#### Latest updates to this book {-} \n\n', updates, '\n')
}
